Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Kista Avenue, at the entry to the Kista Light Opera Center.
Room.LongDescription: The charming old house you see on the east side is the home of the Gaddion Light Opera Company, world renowned for their intepretation and performance of the operas written by Stanaslov and Stirenski. The company is on tour six months of the year, but spend summer and fall in Kista.
